Text.Page:
I understand a healthy amount of caution where the Red Lash pirates are concerned. But if we don't get our fishing operations up and running again, it'll be a race to see whether we starve or go broke first.

You don't exactly look like fishing material to me. But if you take out the {@LinkCreature:11#4003#Red Lash freebooters} on the Jagged Coast, that'll give the fishing fleets the confidence they need to leave their docks.

With less piracy along the Jagged Coast, Nerth can cajole the fishing fleet to get back to sea.

Nagas are tenacious, though, and I'm sure we haven't seen the last of the Red Lash pirates.

If we really want the fishing fleet to feel safe, we've got to root the nagas out of their base at the Pirate Grotto once and for all.

Did I say "we?" I meant "you."
